p: A. annua is currently mainly being used for the treatment of malaria but also for the treatment of skin and digestion ailments, HIV-AIDS, bronchitis, cancer and haemorrhoids. These alternative uses for this medicinal plant is recommended by NGOs such as IFBV-BELHERB and Anamed ( 2012). This section will however only deal with the antiviral activities associated with Artemisia spp., and artemisinin.
